doc:
Bernard Lancret https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bernard_Lancret 0 Bernard Lancret (4 September 1912 – 5 September 1983) was a French film actor. He appeared in over thirty films between 1935 and 1956 in a mixture of leading and supporting roles. He played the composer Franz Schubert in the 1940 film Sérénade. He played the painter Julien Breughel in the 1935 film Carnival in Flanders. Bernard_Lancret ( 4_September_1912 – 5_September_1983 ) was a_French_film_actor . He appeared in over_thirty_films between 1935_and_1956 in a_mixture of leading_and_supporting_roles . He played the_composer_Franz_Schubert in the_1940_film_Sérénade . He played the_painter_Julien_Breughel in the_1935_film_Carnival in Flanders .
